thread.title: Owners of bulker held by Houthis say 'encouraged' by reports of seafarers' imminent release | Business
thread.title_full: Owners of bulker held by Houthis say 'encouraged' by reports of seafarers' imminent release | Business

author: Reuters
title: Owners of bulker held by Houthis say 'encouraged' by reports of seafarers' imminent release | Business
text: Owners of bulker held by Houthis say 'encouraged' by reports of seafarers' imminent release [Reuters](/reuters-stories)| London | Updated: 29-12-2023 15:19 IST | Created: 29-12-2023 15:19 IST - Country: - United Kingdom Galaxy Maritime Ltd, the Isle of Man registered owner of bulk carrier "Galaxy Leader" hijacked by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on Nov. 19, said on Friday that it was encouraged by reports from the Philippines that the release of 17 of their seafarers held by the Houthis was imminent. The bulker's crew was made up of 25 seafarers from Bulgaria, Mexico, Romania, Ukraine and the Philippines, and the company said it was committed to meeting the repatriation expenses of all of the captive seafarers. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) - READ MORE ON: - [Philippines](/news?tag=Philippines) - [Iran](/news?tag=Iran) - [Bulgaria](/news?tag=Bulgaria) - [Galaxy Maritime Ltd](/news?tag=Galaxy+Maritime+Ltd) - [Romania](/news?tag=Romania) - [Houthis](/news?tag=Houthis) - [Yemen](/news?tag=Yemen) - [Ukraine](/news?tag=Ukraine) - [Mexico](/news?tag=Mexico) Advertisement ALSO READ [Yemen's Houthis claim responsibility for attack on Maersk cargo ship heading to Israel -spokesperson](/article/law-order/2746619-yemens-houthis-claim-responsibility-for-attack-on-maersk-cargo-ship-heading-to-israel--spokesperson) [Romania finds drone crater after Russian attack on Ukrainian infrastructure](/article/law-order/2745955-romania-finds-drone-crater-after-russian-attack-on-ukrainian-infrastructure) [Romania must see through tax reforms to offset pension hike impact -EU official](/article/health/2746007-romania-must-see-through-tax-reforms-to-offset-pension-hike-impact--eu-official) [FACTBOX-Who are Yemen's Houthis?
